Card.Name: Imperial Lancer
Card.RulesText: Imperial Lancer has double strike as long as you control a Dinosaur.

Card.Name: Priest of the Wakening Sun
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, you gain 2 life. {3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wakening Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Merfolk Branchwalker
Card.RulesText: When Merfolk Branchwalker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Drover of the Mighty
Card.RulesText: Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Wildgrowth Walker
Card.RulesText: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.

Card.Name: Emissary of Sunrise
Card.RulesText: First strike When Emissary of Sunrise enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Territorial Hammerskull
Card.RulesText: Whenever Territorial Hammerskull attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.

Card.Name: Ranging Raptors
Card.RulesText: Enrage — Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Imperial Aerosaur
Card.RulesText: Flying When Imperial Aerosaur enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

Card.Name: Emperor's Vanguard
Card.RulesText: Whenever Emperor's Vanguard deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Ripjaw Raptor
Card.RulesText: Enrage — Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

Card.Name: Snapping Sailback
Card.RulesText: Flash Enrage — Whenever Snapping Sailback is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counter.)

Card.Name: Sunrise Seeker
Card.RulesText: Vigilance When Sunrise Seeker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Thundering Spineback
Card.RulesText: Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1. {5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

Card.Name: Prying Blade
Card.RulesText: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

Card.Name: Commune with Dinosaurs
Card.RulesText: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Sheltering Light
Card.RulesText: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)

Card.Name: Savage Stomp
Card.RulesText: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a Dinosaur you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Card.Name: Pounce
Card.RulesText: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Card.Name: Ritual of Rejuvenation
Card.RulesText: You gain 4 life. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Legion's Judgment
Card.RulesText: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

Card.Name: Ixalan's Binding
Card.RulesText: When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

Card.Name: Pious Interdiction
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

Card.Name: Slice in Twain
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Sunpetal Grove
Card.RulesText: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.
